org.midao.jdbc.core.pool

Class MidaoFrameworkPoolBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midao.jdbc.core.pool.MidaoFrameworkPoolBinder
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MidaoFrameworkPoolBinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Pooled DataSource implementation connector

    This class is Deprecated - please use midao-jdbc-c3p0(>=0.9.2), midao-jdbc-dbcp(>=1.3/4.2) instead. Those libraries are using MjdbcPoolBinder.
